text: Answer: 2168 Solution: Memory address = 32 - bits Cache size = 32KB = 215 bytes Cache block size = 64 bytes = 2Â¢ Number of lines = Z%: =20 Number of sets = ; =2 Therefore, number of bits for Offset is 6, Index is 7 and Tag is 32 - (7 + 6) = 19. The line size of a cache = Data bits + Tag bits + 1 valid bit + 8 dirty bits + 2 LRU bits =512+ 19+1+8+2= 542 The set size of cache = set size x line size of a cache =4x542 =2168.
